storage.js

Summary
storage.js
StorageSingleton for permanent storage of TabView data.
Functions
toStringPrints [Storage] for debug use
initSets up the object.
uninit
wipeCleans out all the stored data, leaving empty objects.
_openCacheEntryOpens a cache entry for the given <url> and requests access <access>.
saveThumbnailSaves the <imageData> to the cache using the given <url> as key.
loadThumbnailAsynchrously loads image data from the cache using the given <url> as key.
saveTabSaves the data for a single tab.
getTabDataLoad tab data from session store and return it.
saveGroupItemSaves the data for a single groupItem, associated with a specific window.
deleteGroupItemDeletes the data for a single groupItem from the given window.
readGroupItemDataReturns the data for all groupItems associated with the given window.
saveGroupItemsDataSaves the global data for the GroupItems singleton for the given window.
readGroupItemsDataReads the global data for the GroupItems singleton for the given window.
saveUIDataSaves the global data for the <UIManager> singleton for the given window.
readUIDataReads the global data for the <UIManager> singleton for the given window.
saveVisibilityDataSaves visibility for the given window.
saveDataGeneric routine for saving data to a window.
readDataGeneric routine for reading data from a window.
CacheListenerGeneric CacheListener for feeding to asynchronous cache calls.
Functions
toStringPrints [CacheListener] for debug use

Storage

Singleton for permanent storage of TabView data.

Summary
Functions
toStringPrints [Storage] for debug use
initSets up the object.
uninit

Functions

toString

toString: function Storage_toString()

Prints [Storage] for debug use

init

init: function Storage_init()

Sets up the object.

uninit

uninit: function Storage_uninit ()

wipe

wipe: function Storage_wipe()

Cleans out all the stored data, leaving empty objects.

_openCacheEntry

_openCacheEntry: function Storage__openCacheEntry(url,
access,
successCallback,
errorCallback)

Opens a cache entry for the given <url> and requests access <access>.  Calls <successCallback>(entry) when the entry was successfully opened with requested access rights.  Otherwise calls <errorCallback>().

saveThumbnail

saveThumbnail: function Storage_saveThumbnail(url,
imageData,
callback)

Saves the <imageData> to the cache using the given <url> as key.  Calls <callback>(status) when finished (passing true or false indicating whether the operation succeeded).

loadThumbnail

loadThumbnail: function Storage_loadThumbnail(url,
callback)

Asynchrously loads image data from the cache using the given <url> as key.  Calls <callback>(status, data) when finished, passing true or false (indicating whether the operation succeeded) and the retrieved image data.

saveTab

saveTab: function Storage_saveTab(tab,
data)

Saves the data for a single tab.

getTabData

getTabData: function Storage_getTabData(tab,
callback)

Load tab data from session store and return it.  Asynchrously loads the tab’s thumbnail from the cache and calls <callback>(imageData) when done.

saveGroupItem

saveGroupItem: function Storage_saveGroupItem(win,
data)

Saves the data for a single groupItem, associated with a specific window.

deleteGroupItem

deleteGroupItem: function Storage_deleteGroupItem(win,
id)

Deletes the data for a single groupItem from the given window.

readGroupItemData

readGroupItemData: function Storage_readGroupItemData(win)

Returns the data for all groupItems associated with the given window.

saveGroupItemsData

saveGroupItemsData: function Storage_saveGroupItemsData(win,
data)

Saves the global data for the GroupItems singleton for the given window.

readGroupItemsData

readGroupItemsData: function Storage_readGroupItemsData(win)

Reads the global data for the GroupItems singleton for the given window.

saveUIData

saveUIData: function Storage_saveUIData(win,
data)

Saves the global data for the <UIManager> singleton for the given window.

readUIData

readUIData: function Storage_readUIData(win)

Reads the global data for the <UIManager> singleton for the given window.

saveVisibilityData

saveVisibilityData: function Storage_saveVisibilityData(win,
data)

Saves visibility for the given window.

saveData

saveData: function Storage_saveData(win,
id,
data)

Generic routine for saving data to a window.

readData

readData: function Storage_readData(win,
id)

Generic routine for reading data from a window.

CacheListener

Generic CacheListener for feeding to asynchronous cache calls.  Calls <callback>(entry, access, status) when the requested cache entry is available.

Summary
